Mike Pence announcement expected today, not tomorrow POLITICO has learned: Rep. Mike Pence is expected to announce late Thursday whether he is running for president, POLITICO has learned. The announcement will appear first in the Indianapolis Star, an aide said. Mike Pence has been deliberating over his political future, stepping down from House Republican leadership as he mulls whether to run for president

did was wrong. But we wonder how Mark Buehrle can justify being compassionate to animals but wanting Michael Vick to get injured. We liked a comment an ESPN.com reader named Felix Jones wrote about the issue: The obvious response[ especially as a Tigers fan] would be to say,' I hope Mark Buehrle gets hurt!,' but I truly don't. Mr. Mark Buehrle , I hope you go through the entire season- the rest of your career, as well- without any significant injuries. I just hope you suck. of inner peace,'' said Erika, who adopted one of the Michael Vick dogs, Oliver, and didn't want her last name used because she doesn't want herself or Oliver to be targeted for harassment. But I thought, no, no, no, don't get angry. Don't let a person like that ruin you. If I can't control what happens to him, I can control what happens to me and I can channel this anger into a big bunch of love. And so, she met Oliver, the dog they said would never kiss a human, but who now sleeps with his pet parent and showers her with kisses every morning when she wakes up.
